Name: Hummus House
Review Text: If you like HUMMUS, this is the place. Friendly accommodating staff and fresh vegetarian food. Not the cheapest, but very tasty. It is usually busy and seating is limited, so don't come in large groups. They do takeaway too.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text:
Definitely the best food so far in Amsterdam!
The hummus was creamy and tasty, simply amazing.
The potato were good too. Highly recommend!!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: If you want to eat a yummy bowl full of delicious homemade hummus and pitta bread this is the place for you! There's a good choice of options on the menu.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: We had a very good quick dinner at this place. The hummus is very good and affordable. The only down side is that they don't serve any alcohol. After a spicy hummus, a beer would be a very good fit.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Very helpful staff, delicious pitas, hummus and extras, portions don't look big, but actually hard to finish for one person. Loved the music on the background. They do run out of everything before the closing time though.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Perfect hummus and pitas! I took aubergine, guacamole and egg as topping. Perfect sauces. 15 eur

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: It looks authentic but the taste is honestly not impressive.. And I don’t get how they need like 20 minutes to prepare the food.. worst part is that the homemade lemonade is served in a glass that it is clearly not washed properly (the outside of the glass had something sticks)

Name: Hummus House
Review Text:
This place is a real treat. The pita is so fresh and delish, plus everything on the menu is tasty.
Relatively cheep prices, a very good option for vegetarians and vegans.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: It's a very nice and cozy spot to grab a bite! Staff was friendly and relaxed. I definitely recommend the tapas side dishes to go along with the hummus plate. It was delicious!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text:
Very delicious food and a great service
Thank u guys for this delicious meal 🥘
I will come back soon 😊

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: The staff was super friendly, the food was really delicious and the prices were totally fine.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Good food but a bit pricey for bread and hummus

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Simply amazing Israeli food: I took Hummus with Musabaha and shakshuka.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Lots of people really love this place. I've been a couple of times and I am underwhelmed by the service and the food is OK, really I have had a lot better, there was also a lot of raving about the size of the portions in ratio to the …

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Good food for a reasonable price. The location is pretty small and it gets a little tight.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Stopped here for lunch just because I was in the area and starving, and was absolutely overjoyed with the food and service I received! I got the hummus with aubergine, chopped almonds and baked veggies on the side and it was all incredibly …

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Friendly staff, delicious fresh food, generous portions, great value.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: We came on a Saturday at 6pm, but they ran out of food. We didn't mind waiting for them to prepare more food, but they didn't even had time to serve any drinks or anything else. We waited for 40 minutes until more food could be served and …

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: The food was AMAZING! Love this place. We were a party of 10 and yet they served us pretty quickly. The hostess was very friendly and helpful. The variety of options was great and everything we ordered was made well. Loved my time there. Highly recommended.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: We stumbled on this place whilst doing some shopping and coffee shop hopping.  Delicious food with excellent portion sizes, exactly what we were looking for on a wet day in Amsterdam.  Staff were very friendly and attentive.  Highly recommend, particularly for vegetarians.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text:
Hummus looks fancy, its good, but not extraordinary. Staff was very rude though.
I first ordered a hummus plate which came with pickles and 2 pita breads for 7 …

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: My husband and I just had the worst experience at this restaurant. When my husband questioned the extremely long time we had to wait for the food to be served, one of the staff members tried to pick a fight with him. Bold enough to push …

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Best hummus in the city (afaik). Just as good as in Israel according to a coworker.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Best tabouli I have ever had. Great customer service - my wife got a dish with cilantro and parsley (not written on the menu) and she was visibly upset; They just came and replaced it, no questions asked.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: The food is freshly made, staff knows what is in it and can advice you on the vegan options. The Hummus is excellent as is the service and all food I tasted. I highly recommend to spend some time here. Enjoy!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: The lady who was preparing my food tasted something with her fingers and licked them. After that she just prepared my bread etc. The guy who is cooking the food walks around with his underwear showing. I don't know about you, but the cooks …

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Really fresh and good food! Tiny place and nice atmosphere!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Not sure what is going on with this restaurant. We have eaten here several times, great food! So we make a reservation for a Wednesday evening, turn up and the place is closed. We were not the only customers standing outside with a reservation - two other couples showed up.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Had no idea we were about to stumble into one of the most amazing food experiences ever! The food was that good, that I wished everyone walking past the store would come and join in too and experience this incredible cuisine . Fresh, healthy and absolutely delicious! Would highly recommend you give this a try.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Unfortunately, this place lacked the knack for waitering etiquette and class. My friends and I ventured into this restaurant without a reservation, and a group similar to our numbers without a reservation arrived after us and were promptly …

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: This is by far the best hummus I have ever tasted. My ex-wife makes pretty good hummus, and I have tasted Okay hummus both in New York and France. But this is on another level, much like you THINK you have tasted pizza until you try the …

Name: Hummus House
Review Text:
Me and a friend passed the place by chance on our last day on a trip to Amsterdam.
To be honest, the food was good. …

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Far from having the 'Best hummus in town', the food was nothing more than mediocre - store-bought varieties of hummus have tasted better. Don't bother with the Homemade Lemon - it was vile and overpriced. The service, more to the point, was …

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: The food was good and the staff friendly, but the portion sizes and the variety on the menu could be larger. An ingredient delivery (cans of vegetables) took place during lunchtime, leaving the door open and the place cold. One restroom was out of order and the other one could not be locked from inside.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text:
Good food for a pair price.
Seating is a little bit cramped.
I recommend ordering one portion of hummus and one other dish for two people.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text:
Easily the best hummus in Amsterdam, if not the world!

A great selection of Middle Eastern dishes, prepared in an authentic way and served by friendly people. You can't ask for much more!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Absolutely amazing vegetarian and vegan food! Check out the baked aubergine, it is one of a kind. And their Hummus starter is a great dish to share.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Amazing and authentic Israeli food! Felt like I was home.  Fresh pita bread, housemade hummus, salad, hot sauce... and you must have the beets!!!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text:
Wow!!!!!! The best hummus and food in europe.
Clean places, amazing stuff and tom the cook is one of the most amazing person that ive met!! My daily place from now for lunch and dinner!!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Great food, very well presented and tasty at a reasonable price. Nice atmosphere with ambient music and all food is vegetarian or vegan. Only a few minutes walk from Nieuwmarkt or Waterlooplein. Highly recommended A+++

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: One of the best places for eating Middle-Eastern food - delicious at reasonable prices! I also love that they offer tap water for free. Go there for a healthy, hearty meal.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Very good tasting classic hummus

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Super tasty hummus bar with friendly staff. A little pricey, but definitely quality products & homemade, passionate meals.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Ordered several times with Ubereats. Very neatly packed and made with care. Quality and the taste of the food keeps amazing me.  Keep it up!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: We had a quick meal before our train, a large group was already there but they managed to   switch to takeaway. Food was good.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Both times I've been there the food was acceptable. The problem is the chef doesn't wear gloves, has a smokers cough and over seasons the hummus.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Just simple but really really tasty food (I had hummus with extras and fresh, warm pita) and a great atmosphere. Really welcoming and relaxed.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Good quality and freshly made hummus. Their breads could have been better but overall quality of food is quite decent and prices are moderate as well.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Great staff, relaxed vibe, great food!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: We enjoyed our visit here greatly.  A very good choice of dishes and well made.  Great for vegetarians.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: We loved hummus house, the lady who works in there is lovely and the hummus is just as nice. A really nice find for hummus lovers like ourselves.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Good and fresh food, awful and slow service, fair price. The waitress should try and be polite sometimes (she literally threw a pita on our table like a frisbee).

Name: Hummus House
Review Text:
The food is super nice but sadly most of the time half of the menu is not available or there to busy or sold out.
The last two times i went where a dissapointment.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Als vanouds. Sinds de start: excellent Tom😋 thank you collegue for answering the phone and politely taking my order from Mathilde (i only did it because of the view and so on). I shared the photo with my oldeste brother Jochanan be ivriet. I felt much better after i left be4 i arrived. 😘

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Perfect place for veggies, and non veggies should try this also! Healthy and tasty food. Not expensive. I love this place. Friendly staff.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: The place is.quite small, but well worth. The hummus is rich and soft, the baked aubergine is amazing.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Best Hummus I've ever had! Also good price and big portion! Worth the visit

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Read about "pita as pillows of heaven" and best hummus in town. Thought it might be exaggerated. It is not. Truly amazing fresh handmade food.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: I love the food here; really fantastic. In addition, it is very cheap and plays awesome music. Great staff too! :)

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: wonderful place close to neumarkt, as a big hummus lover, i absolutely needed a place like this. i was stuffed with awesome hummus, aubergines and pitas and very happy and satisfied

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Nice fresh food very clean, chilled and lovely staff. Need I say anymore if your after a fresh vegan bite

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Beautiful food with delicious flavor. Meals are large and can easily share between two people.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Best hummus ever. Geat place and awesome hospitality. The owner is so great. Thumps up

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Small little cozy place. Amazing service. Amazing people. Great homemade vegetarian and or vegan food.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Awesome food! Good crew! Some of the dishes have eggs so make sure u read the details.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Delish and Fresh ! Yum!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text:
Excellent dishes, their hummus is truly amazing.

They are a vegetarian restaurant but they have good options for all.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Best hummus I have ever had. Roasted eggplant is out of this world. Pita are pillows of happiness.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: good tasting hummus and salads, friendly serving staff, and convenient location. Good place.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Lovely food and staff!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Incredibly tasty and fresh (veggie) food, down to the freshly baked bread. One if the best places in town for a quick meal

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Disappointing.  Ordered from Thuisbezorgd and it arrived cold, watery and just was not appetizing. Maybe in person is better but via delivery it was terrible.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Delicious food for a good price and very friendly service. Cannot ask for more!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Lovely hummus, and other dishes. Definitely worthwhile getting one of the basic hummus dishes!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Great hummus place. Friendly staff as well. The hummus is top notch.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Loved it! Everything is made fresh, authentic and really tasty. Nice Chef

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Incredible atmosphere, very friendly staff, excellent service + great music and quality food!!! MUST VISIT!!!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: We went to the one near the Rijksmuseum. Terrific hummus and stuffed grape leaves. Friendly staff.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Ridiculously tasty hummus and side dishes. Do not pass a chance to visit!!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Delicious food, good prices and friendly service. Loved it!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Best place to go if you want to eat hummus: get the extra pita!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Delicious food but really loud annoying goa music that made us order our food to go..

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Good place with nice hummus and the rest. A little bit small though.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Hummus is great but the heating sucks.  It was so cold I could see my breath. ....

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: The pickle  salad was abit light but made up for it in hummus. Nice would come back

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: The best dinner!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Amazing hummus! As a traveler, I came here both times I was in Amsterdam.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Excellent food, great atmosphere and friendly staff

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Delicious hummus, good extras and freshly baked pita!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Good hummus, many vegan dishes. Long wait at all hours.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Great food and service. Doesn't accept credit cards

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Best humus in town!!! All home made in front of you... Molto molto buono

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Really nice hummus plates. Loved the aubergine topping

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Very friendly service and flavourful fresh food.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text:
Never ate such a good hummus plate before!
Perfect!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Great idea for a fair price!! Amazing hummus!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Totally delicious! Definitely try the baked potatoes.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Cool spot with one of the best hummus I have tried in Amsterdam

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Fresh and tasty hummus and homemade lemonade. I recommend it!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Crappy service. I love hummus, but Im never coming back!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Very good hummus. And great service!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Loved it. Beware, you get a lot of hummus.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Don't expect your supermarket hummus here, this is the kind of hummus place where people in the middle east line up for.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Super tasty food and great atmosphere.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: The hummus are sooo good. I can't recommendation enough.

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Loved the food and very nice owners!

Name: Hummus House
Review Text: Was great. Nice service and good food.
